ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We gratefully acknowledge the Taiwan Centers for Disease Control (CDC-TW) and Animal Health Research Institute (AHRI-TW) for providing data regarding enterovirus prevalence. However, the interpretations of data and the conclusions contained herein do not represent those of CDC-TW and AHRI-TW. This study was supported by Ministry of Science and Technology, Taiwan grant nos. MOST106â€“2320-B-037-026 and MOST105-2320-B-037-014 to PYC; Center for Infectious Disease and Cancer Research, Kaohsiung Medical University grant nos. KMU-TP105PR20 and KMU-TP104PR14 to PYC and grant no. KMU-TP104E12 to YCT; Chi-Mei Medical Center and Kaohsiung Medical University Research Foundation grant nos. 104CMKMU012 and 105CM-KMU-13 to PYC; and Chi-Mei Foundation Medical Center grant no. CLFHR10510 to YCY. The funders had no roles in the design of the study, the collection and analysis of data, the decision to publish, or the preparation of the manuscript.
